looper.description:
**Once upon a time** there was a ~~little~~ princess... It was a tiny princess! You could hardly see her.

1.  One
2.  Two
3.  Three

-----

The little princess was **playing** in the garden. And that day it happened... The big foot! She didn't see it. Splut! 

A good day to you!

looper.sub_title: A splut sound is never good news
looper.description: You guessed it... ~~The princess was no more!~~ That does it!
